sub_topic: Micelle formation and critical micelle concentration
message_1: What is the critical micelle concentration (CMC) of sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS) at room temperature?
message_2: The critical micelle concentration (CMC) of sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS) at room temperature (25Â°C) is approximately 8.2 mM (millimolar). However, this value can vary slightly depending on factors such as the purity of the SDS and the presence of other substances in the solution.
